To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] state laws- Moving to PA

To the original poster, (For some reason I didn't get that post)

PA is a challenging state for homeschoolers. Which part of PA? I am
wondering, because if you are moving there because of employment in Philly,
for example, you can reside in NJ which has the most liberal laws for
homeschooling.

Faith
